Chapter 2 Database Creation 2.1 Create Lamprey Table 2.2 Create Captures Table 2.3 Create Capture Site Table 2.4 Create Tag Table 2.5 Create Morphometrics Table 2.6 Connecting SQLite to Rstudio to upload my files 2.7 Uploaded tables into Rstudio

Chapter 2 Database Creation Data collected for this project was: collection sites, release sites, length, girth, PIT tag ID, and genetic clips. below is a flow chart of tables created in Rstudio and SQLite. 2.1 Create Lamprey Table Code used in SQLite to create the Lamprey Table. Table includes Lamprey ID(primary key), Capture Sites(Foreign Key), Release Sites, Genetic, and PIT Tag #(Foreign Key). CREATE TABLE Lamprey ( [Lamprey ID] TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, [Capture Site] TEXT NOT NULL REFERENCES Captures ([Capture Site]), [Release Site] TEXT NOT NULL, Genetic INTEGER, [PIT Tags #] TEXT REFERENCES Lamprey ([PIT Tags #]) ); I copied and pasted the raw data from my excel file into the Lamprey Table. 2.2 Create Captures Table Code used in SQLite to create Capture Table. Table includes: Capture ID(Primary Key), Lamprey ID (Foreign Key), Capture Site(Foreign Key), Date. CREATE TABLE Captures ( [Capture ID] TEXT CONSTRAINT [duplicated values] PRIMARY KEY, [Lamprey ID] TEXT REFERENCES Lamprey ([Lamprey ID]) MATCH SIMPLE, [Capture Site] TEXT REFERENCES Capture_Site ([Capture Site]) MATCH SIMPLE, Date TEXT ); 2.3 Create Capture Site Table Code used in SQLite to create Capture Site Table. Table includes: Capture Site(Primary Key), Capture UTM-X, Capture UTM-Y. CREATE TABLE Capture_Site ( [Capture Site] TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE ON CONFLICT REPLACE, [Capture UTM-X] NUMERIC NOT NULL, [Capture UTM-Y] NUMERIC NOT NULL ); 2.4 Create Tag Table Code used in SQLite to create Tag Table. Table includes: PIT Tag #(Primary Key), Status, Lamprey ID (Foreign Key). CREATE TABLE Tags ( [PIT Tag #] TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, Status TEXT, [Lamprey ID] TEXT REFERENCES Lamprey ([Lamprey ID]) MATCH SIMPLE ); 2.5 Create Morphometrics Table Code used in SQLite to create Morphometrics Table. Table includes: Measurement ID(Primary Key), Length, Girth, Genetic, Lamprey ID(Foreign Key). CREATE TABLE Morphometrics ( [Measurement ID] TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, [Length (mm)] NUMERIC, [Girth (mm)] NUMERIC, Genetic INTEGER, [Lamprey ID] TEXT REFERENCES Lamprey ([Lamprey ID]) MATCH SIMPLE NOT NULL ); After creating the tables I copied the information into the tables from my raw excel file of my data. 2.6 Connecting SQLite to Rstudio to upload my files Load packages. library(DBI) library(RSQLite) library(bookdown) Connected Rstudio to my SQLite File Final_db <- dbConnect (RSQLite::SQLite(), "Final.db") 2.7 Uploaded tables into Rstudio Importing tables from SQLite to Rstudio. Morphometrics <- dbGetQuery (conn = Final_db, statement = "SELECT * FROM Morphometrics;") Capture_Site <- dbGetQuery (conn = Final_db, statement = "SELECT * FROM Capture_Site;") Captures <- dbGetQuery (conn = Final_db, statement = "SELECT * FROM Captures;") Lamprey <- dbGetQuery (conn = Final_db, statement = "SELECT * FROM Lamprey;") Tags <- dbGetQuery (conn = Final_db, statement = "SELECT * FROM Tags;") Printing tables to double check uploads. head(Morphometrics) ##
